content: the christmas cookie is the day 3 pattern in the mini amigurumi advent it is about 3 across with frosting and sprinkles made with worsted weight yarn and a g hook sample used red heart super saver and loops and threads impeccable the mini amigurumi advent includes 24 amigurumi patterns for christmas ranging from 3 -6 tall the cookie is available free on my blog as part of the mini amigurumi advent or available for purchase in the mini amigurumi advent ebook with all 24 patterns
